title: What happened to my support ticket?
body: Hey, I submitted a support ticket a little bit ago, and it's just kinda gone. I can still see that I sent one through my email, but when I try and check it on the service page it says it doesn't exist anymore like it just got deleted. Anyone know what's going on?

replies.body: Hmm...tickets usually do not completely disappear.  What is the unique ticket number that you were given in your email?  I should be able to look into it a bit further!

Number apparently do things at the beginning 21690856. It's kind of extraneous circumstances so I understand why it would disappear. The issue is the e-mail and password to my account have been changed without my permission or doing so. Quite frankly I'm amazed I was even able to make a support ticket under this account or sign in to make this post here. Thank you for your time in dealing with this.

I went ahead and investigate your ticket:  From the looks of it, it still exists and was escalated to a Account Recovery Specialist.  You should get a response from them in the near future and they should be able to work with you in order to get your account back.

I hope this helps!  ^.^
Ah, thank you for your time. Sorry about this issue.
